General.Name: Kempower Oyj
General.Description: Kempower Oyj manufactures and sells electric vehicle (EV) charging equipment and solutions under the Kempower brand name in Nordics, rest of Europe, and internationally. It provides satellite charging system solution for public charging and other charging sites; power units; movable chargers for fast charging of various electric vehicles; Pantograph Up that provides automated charging sequence and the fast charging of electric buses; and station chargers, as well as ChargEye cloud service, a cloud-based charging management system to monitor, manage, and diagnose the operations of the chargers and vehicles. The company also offers direct current fast-charging solutions for EVs, such as personal and commercial vehicles, mobile off-highway machinery, electric marine vessels, and boats. It serves charge point operators, retail chains, fleet operators, original equipment manufacturers, and distributor and installer networks. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Lahti, Finland.
